title: Goal.com
description:
Breaking news AND the fastest live football scores straight to your mobile – Goal News now has the best of both worlds.
Transfer rumours, in-depth articles, live scores, goal alerts, match stats… We’ve got it all.
Features include:
AROUND THE CLOCK NEWS
Dive into Goal’s massive collection of detailed articles and breaking news stories.
TRANSFER UPDATES
Be the first to know the latest transfer news, from the planet’s best sources.
WORLDWIDE COVERAGE
English Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Champions League… We cover the globe.
INSTANT NOTIFICATIONS
Breaking news AND live goal alerts – you will not find a faster football app!
COMPREHENSIVE MATCH DATA
Extensive statistics powered by Opta, including; Line-ups, live text commentary, tables, fixtures and more.
HEAD-TO-HEAD STATS
A Head-to-Head section to see how upcoming opponents have performed against each other.
